Primary_Text: Миян вотöдз сiя мунöма ни вöлi
IPA: mijɑn votɘd͡ʑ sijɑ munɘmɑ ɲi vɘli
Analyzed: mijɑn vo-tɘd͡ʑ sijɑ mun-ɘmɑ ɲi vɘl-i
Translation: S/he had already left before we arrived
They are chopping down the forest
But the forest is big and beautiful
The boy kissed the girl and ran away
to go and come back sometimes, usually
While s/he was studying, he lived in the city.
I will go to the theatre tomorrow

Primary_Text: Миян вотöдз сiя мунöма ни вöлi
IPA: mijɑn votɘd͡ʑ sijɑ munɘmɑ ɲi vɘli
Analyzed: mijɑn vo-tɘd͡ʑ sijɑ mun-ɘmɑ ɲi vɘl-i
Translation: S/he had already left before we arrived
What you sow, that you shall reap

Primary_Text: Зэр бöрын бура быдмö сю и турун
IPA: zer bɘrɨn burɑ bɨdmɘ ɕu i turun
Analyzed: zer bɘr-ɨn bur-ɑ bɨdm-ɘ ɕu i turun
Gloss: rain backside-INE good-DER grow-PRS.3SG cereal and grass
Translation: Cereals and grass grow well after rain

Primary_Text: Вуграсись дернитiс вугырсö и черисö уськöтiс
IPA: vugrɑɕiɕ ɟerɲitis vugɨrsɘ i t͡ɕerisɘ uɕkɘtis
Analyzed: vugrɑɕ-iɕ ɟerɲit-is vugɨr-sɘ i t͡ɕeri-sɘ uɕkɘt-is
Gloss: fish.with.a.fishing.rod-PTCP jerk-PST.3SG fishing.rod-ACC.POSS.3SG and fish-ACC.POSS.3SG drop-PST.3SG
Translation: The fisherman pulled the fishing rod and dropped the fish

Primary_Text: Вуграсись дернитiс вугырсö, и чериыс мезмис
IPA: vugrɑɕiɕ ɟerɲitis vugɨrsɘ i t͡ɕeriɨs mezmis
Analyzed: vugrɑɕ-iɕ ɟerɲit-is vugɨr-sɘ i t͡ɕeri-ɨs mezm-is
Gloss: fish.with.a.fishing.rod-PTCP jerk-PST.3SG fishing.rod-ACC.POSS.3SG and fish-POSS.3SG get.free-PST.3SG
Translation: The fisherman pulled the fishing rod and the fish got free
My mother brought the board for drying mushrooms in[to the room]
They sat silently at their tables
to go away from the table
A man comes from the side of houses
I'm writing letter to my brother
I went to Moscow and came back
Wheat has grown to breast this year
Today they sat for a long time without light
in my son, into my son
in a village : into a village : from a village
on a table : onto a table : from a table
on the area of the village, to the direction of the village, from the direction of the village
Firewood is chipped with an axe
Petya and Kolya are fishing with a fishing rod

Primary_Text: Вöрын олiс ош. Ошыт öддьöн ыджыт
IPA: vɘrɨn olis oʃ. oʃɨt ɘɟɟɘn ɨd͡ʒɨt
Analyzed: vɘr-ɨn ol-is oʃ. oʃ-ɨt ɘɟɟɘn ɨd͡ʒɨt
Gloss: forest-INE live-PST.3SG bear. bear-POSS.2SG very big
Translation: A bear lived in the forest. The bear is very big

Primary_Text: Вöрöт мунö нывка. Нывкаыслöн киас куд
IPA: vɘrɘt munɘ nɨvkɑ. nɨvkɑɨslɘn kiɑs kud
Analyzed: vɘr-ɘt mun-ɘ nɨv-kɑ. nɨv-kɑ-ɨs-lɘn ki-ɑs kud
Gloss: forest-PROL go-PRS.3SG girl-DIM. girl-DIM-POSS.3SG-GEN hand-INE.3SG basket.NOM
Translation: A girl goes in the forest. A basket is in the girl's hand

Primary_Text: Кöрт шогмö рудаись, кöдö шедтöны му пытшкись.
IPA: kɘrt ʃogmɘ rudɑiɕ, kɘdɑ ʃedtɘnɨ mu pɨt͡ʃkiɕ
Analyzed: kɘrt ʃogm-ɘ rudɑ-iɕ, kɘd-ɘ ʃedt-ɘnɨ mu pɨt͡ʃkiɕ
Gloss: iron obtain-PRS.3SG ore-ELA, who-ACC extract-PRS-3PL ground from.inside
Translation: iron is obtained from ore, which is extracted from the ground
to move a little vs. to move away
